text: Anatoliy Maksymovych Zlenko (June 2, 1938 Foreign Minister Zlenko passed away, Ukrinform (1 March 2021) – March 1, 2021) was a Ukrainian politician. He was Ukraine's first Foreign Minister. from 1990 to 1994 and again from 2000 to 2003. Zlenko was the Permanent Representative of Ukraine to the United Nations from 1994Decree of the President of Ukraine N 550/94 Про призначення Постійного Представника України при ООН to 1997. Помер перший глава МЗС України Анатолій Зленко, Deutsche Welle (1 March 2021) He was born in Stavyshche, Kyiv Oblast. Zlenko died on March 1, 2021 in Kyiv, Ukraine at the age of 82. The first head of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Ukraine Zlenko - the diplomat died, Ukrayinska Pravda (1 March 2021) ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Ukrainian politicians Category:Ambassadors to the United Nations Category:Ukrainian diplomats
title: Anatoliy Zlenko
